Pre-Game Insights: India have a 19-11 win-loss record in the T20I format against Australia before their upcoming match in the T20 World Cup 2024.
Australia are in a desperate need of a win to stay in the hunt for a place in the semifinal of the T20 World Cup 2024, while India arenâ€™t home and dry in the same regard either.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitches at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, St Lucia, have given the opportunity to the batters to score big runs in the T20 World Cup 2024, proving to be the best conditions to bat in the tournament.
Others: Australia will lock horns against India in the Super 8 Group 1 match of the T20 World Cup 2024 at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium in Gros Islet, St Lucia.
India, who have been unbeaten in the T20 World Cup 2024, still need to be at their best to secure their passage through to the top 4.
